articles.description: Scientist Stephen Hawking made a 16-day trip to India in 2001, visiting Mumbai and New Delhi. During the visit, he met then president KR Narayanan.
articles.content:
It was January 2001 when British physicist Stephen Hawking came to India for the first time, later describing the 16-day long tour as magnificent.
In the first leg of the tour in Mumbai, Hawking add… [+1346 chars]

articles.title: Ancient human remains, Ice Age animal bones found in giant Mexican cave - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A group of divers recently connected two underwater caverns in eastern Mexico to reveal what is believed to be the biggest flooded cave on the planet, a discovery that could help shed new light on the ancient Maya civilization.
articles.content: Archaeologists exploring the words biggest flooded cave in Mexico have discovered ancient human remains at least 9,000 years old and the bones of animals who roamed the earth during the last Ice Age.… [+1980 chars]

articles.title: Nasa’s Curiosity finds purple rocks on Mars, could be hint to watery past - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Nasa officials have called this a suggestion to a greater degree of diversity in the geological composition of the region, and a hint as to what caused Mars to lose most of its water, Sputnik news agency reported on Friday.

articles.title: Watch hypnotic videos of our changing world with Google Timelapse - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In an update released last week, Google released its ‘most detailed view of Earth across space and time’ yet. The project uses data culled from five satellites over the last 32 years.
articles.content:
A new feature in Googles Earth Engine is offering us a sobering look at the way the Earth is changing under our influence.
